1.name: Il buono, il brutto, il cattivo
1.description: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

2.name: Blowup
2.description: A mod London photographer finds something very suspicious in the shots he has taken of a mysterious beauty in a desolate park.

3.name: Persona
3.description: A nurse is put in charge of a mute actress and finds that their personae are melding together.

4.name: Chamber of Horrors
4.description: A one-handed madman (he lost the hand while escaping a hanging) uses various detachable devices as murder weapons to gain revenge on those he believes have wronged him.

5.name: The Black Klansman
5.description: After a black man's daughter is killed by the KKK, he seeks revenge by becoming a Klansman.

6.name: Fahrenheit 451
6.description: In an oppressive future, a fireman whose duty is to destroy all books begins to question his task.

7.name: Fantastic Voyage
7.description: A scientist is nearly assassinated. In order to save him, a submarine is shrunken to microscopic size and injected into his blood stream with a small crew. Problems arise almost as soon as they enter the bloodstream.

8.name: Andrei Rublev
8.description: The life, times and afflictions of the fifteenth-century Russian iconographer.

9.name: Who's Afraid of Virginia Woolf?
9.description: A bitter, aging couple, with the help of alcohol, use a young couple to fuel anguish and emotional pain towards each other.

10.name: Batman: The Movie
10.description: The Dynamic Duo faces four supervillains who plan to hold the world for ransom with the help of a secret invention that instantly dehydrates people.

11.name: The Great St. Trinian's Train Robbery
11.description: The all-girl school foil an attempt by train robbers to recover two and a half million pounds hidden in their school.

12.name: A Man for All Seasons
12.description: The story of Thomas More, who stood up to King Henry VIII when the King rejected the Roman Catholic Church to obtain a divorce and remarry.

13.name: Django
13.description: A coffin-dragging gunslinger and a half-breed prostitute become embroiled in a bitter feud between a Klan of Southern racists and a band of Mexican Revolutionaries.

14.name: One Million Years B.C.
14.description: Prehistoric man Tumak is banished from his savage tribe and meets pretty Loana who belongs to a gentler coastal tribe but he must fight caveman Payto to win her favors.

15.name: Manos: The Hands of Fate
15.description: A family gets lost on the road and stumbles upon a hidden, underground, devil-worshiping cult led by the fearsome Master and his servant Torgo.

16.name: The Night of the Grizzly
16.description: Ex-lawman Jim Cole retires to Wyoming to farm his land, but a land-greedy neighbor, an ex-con turned bounty hunter, and a vicious grizzly bear upset his retirement plans.

17.name: The Russians Are Coming the Russians Are Coming
17.description: Without hostile intent, a Soviet submarine runs aground off New England. Men are sent for a boat, but many villagers go into a tizzy, risking bloodshed.

18.name: The Professionals
18.description: An arrogant Texas millionaire hires four adventurers to rescue his kidnapped wife from a notorious Mexican bandit.

19.name: Voyna i mir
19.description: A Russian Prince experiences battle against Napoleon and a troubled relationship with his father and wife. Finds acceptance of her death and eventually his chance of true love. A spoiled, ...                See full summary »

20.name: The Chase
20.description: The escape of Bubber Reeves from prison affects the inhabitants of a small Southern town.

21.name: Torn Curtain
21.description: An American scientist publicly defects to East Germany as part of a cloak and dagger mission to find the solution for a formula resin before planning an escape back to the West.

22.name: La battaglia di Algeri
22.description: In the 1950s, fear and violence escalate as the people of Algiers fight for independence from the French government.

23.name: The Sand Pebbles
23.description: In 1926, a U.S. Naval engineer gets assigned to a gunboat on a rescue mission in war-torn China.

24.name: Alfie
24.description: An unrepentant ladies' man gradually begins to understand the consequences of his lifestyle.

25.name: Return of the Seven
25.description: Two survivors of the initial Magnificent Seven outfit, Chris and Vin, recruit four new members in order to re-form the outfit and defend a few Mexican villages from attacks by vicious bandits.

26.name: How to Steal a Million
26.description: Romantic comedy about a woman who must steal a statue from a Paris museum to help conceal her father's art forgeries, and the man who helps her.

27.name: Un homme et une femme
27.description: A widow and a widower find their relationship developing into love, but their past tragedies prove hard to overcome, causing them to proceed with utmost delicacy.

28.name: La grande vadrouille
28.description: Several ordinary Frenchmen, helping British pilots avoid Nazi captivity, goes on an epic voyage through the occupied country to the Swiss border.

29.name: The Silencers
29.description: Retired agent Matt Helm is re-activated in order to stop an evil organization from exploding an atom bomb over the USA and starting WWIII.

30.name: The Fortune Cookie
30.description: A crooked lawyer persuades his brother-in-law to feign a serious injury.

31.name: Grand Prix
31.description: American Grand Prix driver Pete Aron is fired by his Jordan-BRM racing team after a crash at Monaco that injures his British teammate, Scott Stoddard. While Stoddard struggles to recover, ...                See full summary »

32.name: Sedmikrásky
32.description: Two girls try to understand the meaning of the world and their life.

33.name: Au hasard Balthazar
33.description: The story of a mistreated donkey and the people around him. A study on saintliness and a sister piece to Bresson's Mouchette.

34.name: Duel at Diablo
34.description: In Apache territory, a supply Army column heads for the next fort, an ex-scout searches for the killer of his Indian wife, and a housewife abandons her husband in order to rejoin her Apache lover's tribe.

35.name: The Shooting
35.description: A mysterious woman persuades two cowboys to help her in a revenge scheme.

36.name: Harper
36.description: Lew Harper, a cool private investigator, is hired by a wealthy California matron to locate her kidnapped husband.

37.name: Masculin féminin
37.description: A romance between young Parisians, shown through a series of vignettes.

38.name: Seconds
38.description: An unhappy middle-aged banker agrees to a procedure that will fake his death and give him a completely new look and identity - one that comes with its own price.

39.name: The Bible: In the Beginning...
39.description: Extravagant production of the first part of the book of Genesis. Covers Adam and Eve, Noah and the Flood and Abraham and Isaac.

40.name: Modesty Blaise
40.description: A spy spoof in the 60s tradition featuring the comic book heroine Modesty Blaise set in the Italian Mediterranean.

41.name: The Blue Max
41.description: A young pilot in the German air force of 1918, disliked as lower-class and unchivalrous, tries ambitiously to earn the medal offered for 20 kills.

42.name: Cast a Giant Shadow
42.description: In 1947, following the U.N. decision to split British Palestine into separate Jewish and Palestinian states, a former U.S. Army officer is recruited by the Jews to reorganize the Haganah.

43.name: This Property Is Condemned
43.description: The dramatic love story of small-town Mississippi girl Alva Starr and railroad official Owen Legate, set during the Great Depression.

44.name: A Funny Thing Happened on the Way to the Forum
44.description: A wily slave must unite a virgin courtesan and his young smitten master to earn his freedom.

45.name: The Quiller Memorandum
45.description: In the West Berlin of the 1960s, two British agents are killed by a Nazi group, prompting British Intelligence to dispatch agent Quiller to investigate.

46.name: Carry On Screaming!
46.description: The sinister Dr Watt has an evil scheme going. He's kidnapping beautiful young women and turning them into mannequins to sell to local stores. Fortunately for Dr Watt, Detective-Sergeant ...                See full summary »

47.name: Hawaii
47.description: An American missionary and his wife travel to the exotic island kingdom of Hawaii, intent on converting the natives. But the clash between the two cultures is too great and instead of understanding there comes tragedy.

48.name: Cul-de-sac
48.description: In search of help, two wounded gangsters on the run find refuge in the secluded castle of a feeble man and his wife; however, under the point of a gun, nothing is what it seems.

49.name: Nevada Smith
49.description: A half American Indian and half white teenager evolves into a hardened killer as he tracks down his parents' murderers.

50.name: Khartoum
50.description: In the Sudan, in 1884 to 1885, Egyptian forces led by a British General defend Khartoum against an invading Muslim Army led by a religious fanatic, the Mahdi.
